message.body: Hey Miss Gracki! So I was trying to think of which peeps would be interested in setting up a table with the vendors at 1st Friday to sell some of our goods. Figured I'd give you first dibs. Would you be interested at all? ...its free. Lauren (and whoever else you'd like) is welcome also, of course.
Good looking Santana!!!! I would love the opportunity!!!

Cool. Its nothing big or spectacular or anything. Pretty much like doing gorilla street vending. Nothing formal. Just pick a good/foot trafficked spot on the street, throw down a table, and sell our shit to the people walkin on by for all the First Friday art openings...
I love it. Keep it simple and hope to make some bonez!
Awesome! The time would be up to us cause we're independent. What do you mean how many pieces tho?
It's pretty much anything and as much as we want.
I'm into it. Also auction was fun. I want to go again on Monday

Know anyone else that would be down to sell? And Yess! I'm glad you liked the auction. This week was kinda slim pickens but that's how things go ya know... Feel free to roll to the auction any time. I'm kind of addicted.
Ill try and think of people and let you know. Can't think of anyone at the moment though.
No worries. I'm sure we'll clean up regardless! ;)
